headline: Credo AI Named a Gartner® Cool Vendor 2025 in AI Cybersecurity Governance
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, October 21, 2025--Credo AI, the global leader in enterprise AI governance, today announced that it has been recognized as a Gartner Cool Vendor in AI Cybersecurity Governance. We believe this recognition highlights the rising urgency for enterprises to operationalize AI oversight, risk management, and compliance at scale — and validates governance as foundational to AI maturity.

headline: 5 Gartner predictions about IT’s future
summary: As CIOs head into 2026, they’ll have to figure out where AI is useful and where overreliance creates a decline in skills critical to the business.

raw.headline: 5 Gartner predictions about IT’s future
raw.summary: As CIOs head into 2026, they’ll have to figure out where AI is useful and where overreliance creates a decline in skills critical to the business.

headline: Gartner Survey Reveals 50% of Non-U.S. CIOs and Technology Executives Anticipate Changes to Vendor Engagement Based on Regional Factors
summary: ORLANDO, Fla., October 21, 2025--Fifty percent of CIOs and technology executives outside the United States anticipate changes in vendor engagement due to regional factors, compared to only 31% of their U.S.-based counterparts, according to an annual global survey of more than 2,500 CIOs and technology executives by Gartner, Inc., a business and technology insights company.​

headline: Gartner to Report Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results on November 4, 2025
summary: STAMFORD, Conn., October 21, 2025--Gartner, Inc. (NYSE: IT) will report its financial results for third quarter 2025 before the market opens on Tuesday, November 4, 2025.

headline: What to Expect From Gartner’s Q3 2025 Earnings Report
summary: Gartner is scheduled to release its third-quarter results next month, and analysts expect a modest single-digit decline in earnings.
